thread.title: Billie Lourd Pays Tribute to Mother Carrie Fisher With Heart-Wrenching Flashback Photo
thread.title_full: Billie Lourd Pays Tribute to Mother Carrie Fisher With Heart-Wrenching Flashback Photo

author: Jackie Willis
title: Billie Lourd Pays Tribute to Mother Carrie Fisher With Heart-Wrenching Flashback Photo
text: Billie Lourd Pays Tribute to Mother Carrie Fisher With Heart-Wrenching Flashback Photo by Jackie Willis 8:50   Photo: Getty Images Billie Lourd shared another mother-daughter moment she had with her beloved mother, Carrie Fisher. On Wednesday night, the 24-year-old actress posted a flashback photo to Instagram of herself as a child sitting in the lap of her mom while in a stretch limousine. Lourd only captioned the sweet image with twinkle stars and an angel emoji. The photo tribute comes nearly two months after Fisher and Lourd's grandmother, Debbie Reynolds, died within days of one another. ‚ú®üòá‚ú® A post shared by Billie Lourd (@praisethelourd) on Feb 22, 2017 at 2:46pm PST Lourd's Scream Queens co-stars -- including boyfriend Taylor Lautner -- have shown their support for her during this tough time, and in January, Glen Powell, who is also on the FX series, spoke exclusively to ET about how the young actress was doing after losing both her mother and grandmother. WATCH: Billie Lourd Jets Off to Cabo With Taylor Lautner After Heartbreaking Family Deaths "If there‚Äôs anybody that can take something so tragic in their life happening, it‚Äôs Billie,‚Äù the 28-year-old actor said. ‚ÄúShe‚Äôs a person who was raised by two very strong women, and she‚Äôs a very strong woman. I think she‚Äôs digesting it very well. She‚Äôs very emotionally intelligent, and I think she‚Äôs got a great group of friends around her that are supporting her, and I hope I am one of them.‚Äù
